source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FCTREFASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLALLOCATE_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLPRODUCT_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '  SELECT CASE WHEN Trx_Desc = \'Beginning Balance:\' THEN CONCAT(TRX.[Trx_Code],\'-\',FUN.[Fund_ID]) ELSE Trx_Code END AS Trx_Code\n      ,FUN.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n	  ,TRX.GL_Code\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n	  ,CASE WHEN COA.[GL_Code] IS NULL THEN \'NO GL_CODE DURING LOAD\' ELSE COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n  FROM [staging].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.[GL_Code] = COA.[GL_Code] AND COA.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Fund] FUN\n  ON TRX.[Fund_ID] = FUN.[Company_Name] AND FUN.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Asset] ASS\n  ON TRX.[Asset_ID] = ASS.[Asset_ID] AND FUN.[Fund_ID] = ASS.[Fund_ID] AND ASS.[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_ID]\n      ,[Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Debit_Credit,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Debit_Credit,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
UnionNewTransactions derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		Trx_Type = toString('Actual')) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow split(Trx_Desc!='Beginning Balance:',
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@(TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance, TrxCodeBeginningBalance)
RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly select(mapColumn(
		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		RelationBB_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		RelationBB_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		RelationBB_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		RelationBB_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		RelationBB_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeBeginningBalance, SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance lookup(Trx_Code == RelationBB_Trx_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupDBbeginningBalance
LookupDBbeginningBalance split(isNull(RelationBB_Trx_Code),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@(NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance, ExistingTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeginingBalanceColumns
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions
AddAuditColumns sink(input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,0),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ASS.[Fund_ID]\n      ,ASS.[Asset_ID]\n      ,[DatabaseName]\n      ,[Group_ID]\n      ,[Attribute_id]\n      ,[Origin_id]\n      ,[Asset_Offset]\n      ,[Version_name]\nFROM [staging].[Forecast_Asset_reference] STA\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Asset ASS\nON STA.Fund_ID = ASS.Fund_ID AND STA.Asset_ID = ASS.Asset_ID\nWHERE ASS.record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[DatabaseName]\n      ,[Group_ID]\n      ,[Attribute_id]\n      ,[Origin_id]\n      ,[Asset_Offset]\n      ,[Version_name]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,DatabaseName,Group_ID,Attribute_id,Origin_id,Asset_Offset,Version_name)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Version_name == Relation_Version_name,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,DatabaseName,Group_ID,Attribute_id,Origin_id,Asset_Offset,Version_name)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_DatabaseName = DatabaseName,
		Relation_Group_ID = Group_ID,
		Relation_Attribute_id = Attribute_id,
		Relation_Origin_id = Origin_id,
		Relation_Asset_Offset = Asset_Offset,
		Relation_Version_name = Version_name,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName = Relation_DatabaseName,
		Group_ID = Relation_Group_ID,
		Attribute_id = Relation_Attribute_id,
		Origin_id = Relation_Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset = Relation_Asset_Offset,
		Version_name = Relation_Version_name,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Version_name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Allocation_percent as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT COA.[GL_Code]\n      ,STA.[GL_Desc]\n      ,ASS.[Fund_ID]\n      ,ASS.[Asset_ID]\n      ,[Allocation_percent]\nFROM [staging].[Forecast_GL_Allocation] STA\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Asset ASS\nON STA.Fund_ID = ASS.Fund_ID AND STA.Asset_ID = ASS.Asset_ID AND ASS.record_deleted_flag = 0\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Chart_of_Account COA\nON STA.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Allocation_percent as decimal(18,4),
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[GL_Desc]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[Allocation_percent]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[process_name]\nFROM [relational].[Forecast_GL_Allocation]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Code,GL_Desc,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,Allocation_percent)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Code,GL_Desc,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,Allocation_percent)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_GL_Desc = GL_Desc,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Allocation_percent = Allocation_percent,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Allocation_percent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Allocation_percent,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		GL_Desc = Relation_GL_Desc,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Allocation_percent = Relation_Allocation_percent,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Allocation_percent as decimal(18,4),
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Allocation_percent,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ASS.[Fund_ID]\n      ,ASS.[Asset_ID]\n      ,[Status]\n      ,[Product]\n      ,COA.[GL_Code]\nFROM [staging].[Forecast_GL_Product_Map] STA\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Asset ASS\nON STA.Fund_ID = ASS.Fund_ID AND STA.Asset_ID = ASS.Asset_ID AND ASS.record_deleted_flag = 0\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Chart_of_Account COA\nON STA.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[Status]\n      ,[Product]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n	  ,[start_datetime]\n	  ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Forecast_GL_Product_Map]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,Status,Product,GL_Code)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,Status,Product,GL_Code)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Status = Status,
		Relation_Product = Product,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Status = Relation_Status,
		Product = Relation_Product,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Databasename as string,
		Roll_Forward_period as string,
		Group_ID as string,
		Attribute_Id as string,
		Origin_id as string,
		Version_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertStringToInteger select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		DatabaseName = Databasename,
		Asset_Offset = Roll_Forward_period,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id = Attribute_Id,
		Origin_id,
		Version_name = Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Group_ID = toInteger(Group_ID),
		Attribute_Id = toInteger(Attribute_Id),
		Origin_id = toInteger(Origin_id),
		Roll_Forward_period = toInteger(Roll_Forward_period)) ~> ConvertStringToInteger
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Allocation_percentage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertAllocationPercentage select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Allocation_percentage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Allocation_percentage = iifNull(toDecimal(trim(Allocation_percentage,'%'), 18, 4, '###.##'),0)) ~> ConvertAllocationPercentage
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Allocation_percent as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Allocation_percent = Allocation_percentage
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		{GL Code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code = {GL Code}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code
	)) ~> StagingDB
